title: dAsanentAguvenu
sahitya:
dsanentAguvenu dhareyoLage nAnu


anupallavi

  vAsudEvanalli lEsha bhakutiya kANe


caraNam 1    gUTa nAmava hoDedu guNDu tambige hiDidu gOTanju dhOtara maDiyanuTTu 
dATugAliDuta nA dhareyoLage baralenna bUTakatana nODi bramisadiri janare
    caraNam 2    arttadalle manasu AsaktavAgiddu vyarttavAyidu janma vasudheyoLage 
artiyindali hariya arcisiddilla nA satya shaucagaLariye sajjanaru kELi
    caraNam 3    indirEshana pUje endu mADiddilla sandhyAna japa tapagaLondanariye 
ondu sAdhana kANe purandara viTTalana dvandava pAdava nambi aridu bhajisadale
